author: adminescalation
install_msg:
## :white_check_mark: Successfully installed StaffManager.
**Questions?** [We're listening](<https://www.beehive.systems/contact-us>)

This cog helps manage and track staff activities within your Discord server.
name: staffmanager
description: StaffManager is designed to help manage and track staff activities, including role changes, suspensions, and punishments issued.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores data about staff members, including their roles, suspension status, and punishments issued. No personal data is stored beyond what is necessary for these functions.
